7. Fraud, Chargebacks & Risk Policy
(Verbose) metadata:
{ "title":"Fraud & Chargebacks Policy", "doc_type":"policy",
"version":"2.0" } content: 1. Fraud Screening We use automated systems analyzing:
● IP reputation
● Device fingerprinting
● Velocity checks
● Address matching
● Payment risk scores 2. Verification For high-risk orders, customers may be asked to provide:
● Government ID ● Billing statement ● Selfie verification
Failure to comply results in cancellation. 3. Chargeback Handling We respond to banks with: ● Tracking history
● Delivery proof
● Account activity logs ● Fraud indicators 4. Repeat Offenders Accounts with 2+ chargebacks are locked permanently. 8. Accessibility Policy (Verbose) metadata:
{ "title":"Accessibility Policy", "doc_type":"policy", "version":"1.0"
} content: 1. Commitment We aim to comply with WCAG 2.1 AA standards. 2. Accessibility Features ● Keyboard navigation
● Contrast-friendly themes
● Screen-reader compatibility
● Scalable fonts ● Captioned videos 3. Reporting Issues
Users may report issues via email.
We respond within 48 hours and plan remediation steps based on priority.

metadata:
{ "title":"Shipping & Delivery Policy", "doc_type":"policy",
"version":"3.0", "effective_date":"2025-03-01",
"jurisdiction":"Global", "language":"en",
"keywords":["shipping","delivery","tracking","delays","customs","lost
package"] } content: 1. Shipping Methods We offer multiple shipping options depending on destination, product weight, warehouse
availability, and courier constraints:
● Standard Ground Shipping (3–7 days).
● Expedited Shipping (2–3 days).
● Priority / Overnight (1 business day).
● International Express (varies by region). Some oversized or battery-powered products require special handling. 2. Order Processing Times ● Orders placed before 1 PM local warehouse time ship the same day.
● Orders placed after cutoff ship next business day.
● Orders placed during peak seasons (Nov–Dec) may require additional 1–2 days. 3. Tracking & Notifications
Once shipped, customers receive:
● Email confirmation with tracking number
● Optional SMS updates
● Real-time tracking link through their account dashboard Tracking may take up to 24 hours to activate. 4. Delivery Attempts & Signatures
Depending on courier rules and location: ● Up to 3 delivery attempts may be made.
● Signature may be required for orders over $500.
● After failed attempts, packages may be held at a pickup center. 5. Shipping Restrictions We cannot ship to: ● PO Boxes for oversized or hazardous items. ● Restricted international destinations due to sanctions. ● Countries with lithium battery restrictions (varies). 6. Customs & International Duties
International shipments may incur: ● VAT ● Customs duties ● Brokerage fees
Customers are responsible unless stated otherwise. 7. Lost or Stolen Packages A package is considered “lost” if:
● No tracking updates for 10+ business days (domestic)
● 14+ business days (international)
After investigation, we may offer replacement or refund. Stolen packages (marked delivered but not received) may require:
● Police report ● Proof of residence ● ID verification
We use this to prevent false claims. 8. Severe Weather & Carrier Delays
We are not liable for delays caused by: ● Extreme weather ● Natural disasters ● Strikes ● Customs backlog
Refunds for shipping fees are provided only if delay is caused by our error. 3. Privacy & Data Protection Policy
(Verbose) metadata:
{ "title":"Privacy & Data Protection Policy", "doc_type":"policy",
"version":"2.2", "effective_date":"2025-01-01",
"jurisdiction":"Global", "language":"en", "keywords":["privacy","data
protection","GDPR","PII","security"] } content: 1. Data We Collect We collect personal data necessary for: ● Order fulfillment ● Account creation ● Customer support ● Personalization ● Fraud prevention
● Legal compliance
Types of data include:
● Identifiers (name, email, phone)
● Addresses (billing + shipping)
● Payment tokens (PCI-compliant) ● Order and browsing history ● Device/browser metadata ● Marketing preferences 2. How We Use Data
We process data under the following bases: ● Contract fulfillment ● Legitimate interest (fraud, personalization)
● Compliance with legal obligations
● With consent (newsletter, SMS marketing) We do NOT sell personal data. 3. Data Sharing We share data only with vetted service providers:
● Payment processors ● Warehouses ● Logistics carriers
● Analytics platforms
● Fraud prevention tools
Each third party is bound by a Data Processing Agreement (DPA). 4. Data Retention
● Order data: retained for 7 years ● User accounts: retained while account is active

● Marketing consent logs: 5 years
● Web logs: 90 days, unless required longer for security 5. Data Subject Rights
Customers may request: ● Access ● Correction ● Deletion ● Portability
● Restriction
We respond within 30 days. 6. Security Measures We use industry-standard security:
● Encryption at rest and transit ● MFA for admin dashboards ● IP allow lists for sensitive services ● Regular penetration testing
● Annual SOC 2 security audits
● Zero-trust access model for internal staff 7. Children
Our services are not targeted at children under 16. 4. Terms of Service (Verbose) metadata:

"effective_date":"2025-01-10", "jurisdiction":"US", "language":"en" } content: 1. Acceptance of Terms By using our website, mobile apps, or any services, users agree to be bound by these Terms of
Service. 2. Account Responsibilities Users must: ● Provide accurate information ● Maintain account confidentiality
● Notify us immediately of unauthorized access We reserve the right to suspend accounts for suspicious activity. 3. Purchases & Order Acceptance Orders placed on our website constitute offers to purchase.
We may reject orders due to:
● Inventory errors
● Pricing mistakes
● Fraud suspicion
● Inaccurate customer information 4. Pricing & Taxes
All prices are displayed excluding applicable taxes unless stated otherwise.
We reserve the right to modify prices without prior notice. 5. Prohibited Uses Users may not:
● Use bots or automated tools ● Modify or copy site materials
● Resell products commercially
● Attempt to disrupt website infrastructure 6. Limitation of Liability
To the maximum extent allowed by law, our total liability is limited to the amount paid for the
product in question. 7. Dispute Resolution
Disputes shall be resolved via binding arbitration under the laws of the listed jurisdiction. 5. Payment & Billing Policy (Verbose) metadata:

● PayPal
● Apple Pay / Google Pay
● Buy Now Pay Later (where available) ● Store credit ● Gift cards 2. Authorization Holds We may place a temporary authorization hold to confirm payment validity. 3. Subscription Orders Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled.
Customers receive renewal reminders 5 days before charge. 4. Chargebacks
If a customer disputes a transaction:
● We submit delivery confirmation and correspondence
● Accounts with repeated chargebacks may be suspended 5. Price Errors In case of pricing mistakes, orders may be canceled with full refund. 6. Promotions & Gift Cards (Verbose) metadata:

● Expired codes cannot be reissued 2. Exclusions Promotions typically do not apply to: ● Clearance items ● Gift cards ● Subscriptions
● Third-party marketplace items 3. Gift Cards ● Non-refundable ● Never expire
● Can be redeemed online only
● Lost cards can be reissued with proof of purchase

1. Returns & Refunds Policy metadata:
{ "title":"Returns & Refunds Policy", "doc_type":"policy",
"version":"2.0", "effective_date":"2025-01-15", "jurisdiction":"US",
"language":"en",
"keywords":["returns","refunds","restocking","defects","exchange","war
ranty","eligibility"] } content: 1. Overview
This Returns & Refunds Policy outlines the conditions under which customers may return
products purchased from our online store. Our goal is to provide a fair, transparent, and
customer-friendly process that balances product quality control with operational efficiency. 2. Standard Return Window
Customers may request a return within 30 calendar days from the date of delivery.
● Day of delivery counts as Day 1.
● For multi-item orders, each item has its own return window based on when it was delivered. ● Holidays and weekends do not affect eligibility. Examples
● If delivered on March 1, return eligibility ends March 30.
● If a replacement product is delivered, the window resets for that replacement item only. 3. Eligibility Criteria
To qualify for a return, the item must meet all of the following requirements: ● Unused and in “as-new” condition. ● Returned in original manufacturer packaging or equivalent protective packaging.
● All accessories (cables, manuals, screws, chargers), warranty cards, and promotional
items must be included. ● The product must not show signs of misuse, impact damage, exposure to liquids, or modification. 4. Non-Returnable Items The following categories cannot be returned:
● Perishable goods (foods, flowers, supplements).
● Personalized, engraved, monogrammed, or made-to-order items.
● Opened hygiene-sensitive items (earbuds, razors, pillows).
● Software, digital downloads, and activation codes.
● Gift cards and prepaid cards. ● Items marked “Final Sale”, “Clearance”, or “Non-returnable”. 5. Defective, Damaged, or Incorrect Products
If an item arrives damaged, defective, or different from what was ordered:
● Customers must notify us within 7 days of delivery.
● We may request photographs, videos, or troubleshooting steps.
● Depending on product type, we may offer:
○ Replacement ○ Partial refund ○ Full refund ○ Store credit ● In some cases, defective items do not need to be returned (low-value threshold under
$15). 6. Return Shipping Costs ● Our fault (wrong item, defect, mis-shipment): We provide a prepaid return label.
● Customer preference (changed mind, wrong size, no longer needed):
○ Customer pays return shipping.
○ A restocking fee up to $8 may apply for bulky or high-cost items. International return shipping fees vary by region. 7. Refund Processing
After receiving the returned product, we perform inspection within 3–5 business days.
Refunds are issued to the original payment method within 5–10 business days after approval.
Refunds are not issued to expired cards; banks will route funds automatically. 8. Exchanges Where available, customers may request an exchange for: ● Different size ● Different color ● Replacement unit of same SKU
Exchanges follow the same inspection and eligibility rules as refunds. 9. Abuse Prevention & Limitations We monitor excessive returns, fraudulent claims, and “wardrobing.”
We reserve the right to:
● Limit return eligibility for high-frequency return accounts.
● Require additional verification.
● Deny future purchases in extreme cases. 2. Shipping & Delivery Policy (Verbose)

Expired codes cannot be reissued

2. Exclusions

Promotions typically do not apply to:

Clearance items

Gift cards

Subscriptions

Third-party marketplace items

3. Gift Cards

Non-refundable

Never expire

Can be redeemed online only

Lost cards can be reissued with proof of purchase



7. Fraud, Chargebacks & Risk Policy (Verbose)

content:

1. Commitment

We aim to comply with WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

2. Accessibility Features

Keyboard navigation

Captioned videos

3. Reporting Issues

Users may report issues via email. We respond within 48 hours and plan remediation steps based on priority.

Countries with lithium battery restrictions (varies).

6. Customs & International Duties

International shipments may incur:

VAT

Customs duties

Brokerage fees Customers are responsible unless stated otherwise.

7. Lost or Stolen Packages

A package is considered “lost” if:

No tracking updates for 10+ business days (domestic)

14+ business days (international) After investigation, we may offer replacement or refund.

Stolen packages (marked delivered but not received) may require:

Police report

Proof of residence

ID verification We use this to prevent false claims.

8. Severe Weather & Carrier Delays

We are not liable for delays caused by:

Extreme weather

Natural disasters

Strikes

Customs backlog Refunds for shipping fees are provided only if delay is caused by our error.



3. Privacy & Data Protection Policy (Verbose)

metadata: { "title":"Privacy & Data Protection Policy", "doc_type":"policy", "version":"2.2", "effective_date":"2025-01-01", "jurisdiction":"Global", "language":"en", "keywords":["privacy","data protection","GDPR","PII","security"] }

content:

1. Data We Collect

We collect personal data necessary for:

Order fulfillment

Account creation

Customer support

Personalization

Fraud prevention

Legal compliance Types of data include:

Identifiers (name, email, phone)

Addresses (billing + shipping)

Payment tokens (PCI-compliant)

Order and browsing history

Device/browser metadata

Marketing preferences

2. How We Use Data

We process data under the following bases:

Contract fulfillment

Legitimate interest (fraud, personalization)

Compliance with legal obligations

With consent (newsletter, SMS marketing)

We do NOT sell personal data.

3. Data Sharing

We share data only with vetted service providers:

Payment processors

Warehouses

Logistics carriers

Analytics platforms

Fraud prevention tools Each third party is bound by a Data Processing Agreement (DPA).

4. Data Retention

Order data: retained for 7 years

User accounts: retained while account is active

Marketing consent logs: 5 years

Web logs: 90 days, unless required longer for security

5. Data Subject Rights

Customers may request:

Access

Correction

Deletion

Portability

Restriction We respond within 30 days.

6. Security Measures

We use industry-standard security:

Encryption at rest and transit

MFA for admin dashboards

IP allow lists for sensitive services

Regular penetration testing

Annual SOC 2 security audits

Zero-trust access model for internal staff

7. Children

Our services are not targeted at children under 16.



4. Terms of Service (Verbose)

metadata: { "title":"Terms of Service", "doc_type":"tos", "version":"3.5", "effective_date":"2025-01-10", "jurisdiction":"US", "language":"en" }

content:

1. Acceptance of Terms

By using our website, mobile apps, or any services, users agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

2. Account Responsibilities

Users must:

Provide accurate information

Maintain account confidentiality

Notify us immediately of unauthorized access

We reserve the right to suspend accounts for suspicious activity.

3. Purchases & Order Acceptance

Orders placed on our website constitute offers to purchase. We may reject orders due to:

Inventory errors

Pricing mistakes

Fraud suspicion

Inaccurate customer information

4. Pricing & Taxes

All prices are displayed excluding applicable taxes unless stated otherwise. We reserve the right to modify prices without prior notice.

5. Prohibited Uses

Users may not:

Use bots or automated tools

Modify or copy site materials

Resell products commercially

Attempt to disrupt website infrastructure

6. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent allowed by law, our total liability is limited to the amount paid for the product in question.

7. Dispute Resolution

Disputes shall be resolved via binding arbitration under the laws of the listed jurisdiction.



5. Payment & Billing Policy (Verbose)

metadata: { "title":"Payment Billing & Pricing Policy", "doc_type":"policy", "version":"2.0", "effective_date":"2025-02-05", "jurisdiction":"Global" }

content:

1. Accepted Payment Methods

Credit/Debit (Visa, Mastercard, Amex)

PayPal

Apple Pay / Google Pay

Buy Now Pay Later (where available)

Store credit

Gift cards

2. Authorization Holds

We may place a temporary authorization hold to confirm payment validity.

3. Subscription Orders

Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled. Customers receive renewal reminders 5 days before charge.

4. Chargebacks

If a customer disputes a transaction:

We submit delivery confirmation and correspondence

Accounts with repeated chargebacks may be suspended

5. Price Errors

In case of pricing mistakes, orders may be canceled with full refund.



6. Promotions & Gift Cards (Verbose)

1. Returns & Refunds Policy 

metadata: { "title":"Returns & Refunds Policy", "doc_type":"policy", "version":"2.0", "effective_date":"2025-01-15", "jurisdiction":"US", "language":"en", "keywords":["returns","refunds","restocking","defects","exchange","warranty","eligibility"] }

content:

1. Overview

This Returns & Refunds Policy outlines the conditions under which customers may return products purchased from our online store. Our goal is to provide a fair, transparent, and customer-friendly process that balances product quality control with operational efficiency.

2. Standard Return Window

Customers may request a return within 30 calendar days from the date of delivery.

Day of delivery counts as Day 1.

For multi-item orders, each item has its own return window based on when it was delivered.

Holidays and weekends do not affect eligibility.

Examples

If delivered on March 1, return eligibility ends March 30.

If a replacement product is delivered, the window resets for that replacement item only.

3. Eligibility Criteria

To qualify for a return, the item must meet all of the following requirements:

Unused and in “as-new” condition.

Returned in original manufacturer packaging or equivalent protective packaging.

All accessories (cables, manuals, screws, chargers), warranty cards, and promotional items must be included.

The product must not show signs of misuse, impact damage, exposure to liquids, or modification.

4. Non-Returnable Items

The following categories cannot be returned:

Perishable goods (foods, flowers, supplements).

Personalized, engraved, monogrammed, or made-to-order items.

Opened hygiene-sensitive items (earbuds, razors, pillows).

Software, digital downloads, and activation codes.

Gift cards and prepaid cards.

Items marked “Final Sale”, “Clearance”, or “Non-returnable”.

5. Defective, Damaged, or Incorrect Products

If an item arrives damaged, defective, or different from what was ordered:

Customers must notify us within 7 days of delivery.

We may request photographs, videos, or troubleshooting steps.

Depending on product type, we may offer:

Replacement

Partial refund

Full refund

Store credit

In some cases, defective items do not need to be returned (low-value threshold under $15).

6. Return Shipping Costs

Our fault (wrong item, defect, mis-shipment): We provide a prepaid return label.

Customer preference (changed mind, wrong size, no longer needed):

Customer pays return shipping.

A restocking fee up to $8 may apply for bulky or high-cost items.

International return shipping fees vary by region.

7. Refund Processing

After receiving the returned product, we perform inspection within 3–5 business days. Refunds are issued to the original payment method within 5–10 business days after approval.

Refunds are not issued to expired cards; banks will route funds automatically.

8. Exchanges

Where available, customers may request an exchange for:

Different size

Different color

Replacement unit of same SKU Exchanges follow the same inspection and eligibility rules as refunds.

9. Abuse Prevention & Limitations

We monitor excessive returns, fraudulent claims, and “wardrobing.” We reserve the right to:

Limit return eligibility for high-frequency return accounts.

Require additional verification.

Deny future purchases in extreme cases.



2. Shipping & Delivery Policy (Verbose)

metadata: { "title":"Shipping & Delivery Policy", "doc_type":"policy", "version":"3.0", "effective_date":"2025-03-01", "jurisdiction":"Global", "language":"en", "keywords":["shipping","delivery","tracking","delays","customs","lost package"] }

content:

1. Shipping Methods

We offer multiple shipping options depending on destination, product weight, warehouse availability, and courier constraints:

Standard Ground Shipping (3–7 days).

Expedited Shipping (2–3 days).

Priority / Overnight (1 business day).

International Express (varies by region).

Some oversized or battery-powered products require special handling.

2. Order Processing Times

Orders placed before 1 PM local warehouse time ship the same day.

Orders placed after cutoff ship next business day.

Orders placed during peak seasons (Nov–Dec) may require additional 1–2 days.

3. Tracking & Notifications

Once shipped, customers receive:

Email confirmation with tracking number

Optional SMS updates

Real-time tracking link through their account dashboard

Tracking may take up to 24 hours to activate.

4. Delivery Attempts & Signatures

Depending on courier rules and location:

Up to 3 delivery attempts may be made.

Signature may be required for orders over $500.

After failed attempts, packages may be held at a pickup center.

5. Shipping Restrictions

We cannot ship to:

PO Boxes for oversized or hazardous items.

Restricted international destinations due to sanctions.
